text: Hagi ana nehu'za ha' vahe'mo'za seli nozamine, sipisipi afu'zamine, seli noma negiza tavarave zamine maka fenoza zaminena e'neriza, kemori afu'zminena zamavare'za vugahaze. Ana nehanage'za vahe'mo'za kezatizami'za, tamagri'ma tamazeri koro'ma hania zamo'a maka kaziga tamazeri kagie hu'za hugahaze.
